changeSet.createView: select ap.id,ap.purpose_of_sample, (case when ap.start_time !=null then (ap.start_time||'è‡³'||ap.end_time) else null end ) as apply_time,ap.apply_person_name,ap.apply_code,ap.status, (select d.delegate_name from delegate d where d.id = ap.delegate_id) as delegate_name, (select LISTAGG(sample,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY sample) from (select distinct s.sample_type_name as sample from stock_out_requirement req left join sample_type s on req.sample_type_id=s.id where req.stock_out_apply_id=ap.id union select distinct s.sample_type as sample from stock_out_requirement req left join stock_out_required_sample s on req.id=s.stock_out_requirement_id where req.stock_out_apply_id=ap.id)) as sample_types, (select sum(req.count_of_sample) from stock_out_requirement req where req.stock_out_apply_id=ap.id) as count_of_sample from stock_out_apply ap
